snippet.title: Q*Bert: Rebooted Trailer | PS4, PS3, PS Vita
snippet.description:
One of the most critically acclaimed and commercially successful arcade games of the 1980s is back in its Classic pixel-perfect 2D form, and a re-imagined Reboot version with state-of-the-art 3D gameplay and graphics that remain faithful to the original concept. 

http://www.lootentertainment.com

TM & © 2014 Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Published for PlayStation® by LOOT Entertainment, a Sony DADC US Inc. company.
